casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintin Sharod TAYLOR 32A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 26, 2019 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Taylor, Quintin Sharod. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 25th of March 2019 by Plaintiff-Appellee :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of March 2019."

Plaintiff-Appellee shall have up to and including the 25th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
